Query:
Select 
    				u.username, 
    				u.firstname, 
    				u.lastname, 
    				r.displaytext, 
    				et.displaytext,
    				TO_CHAR (FROM_TZ(CAST(u.CreateTime AS TIMESTAMP),'+00:00') AT TIME ZONE '$(TimeZone)',  'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),
					u.createdby 
				From 
					mfino_user u, 
					enum_text et, 
					role r
				Where 
					(et.tagid=5268 and u.status=et.enumcode) 
					and (u.role=r.enumcode)
					and u.CreateTime >= ${StartTime}
					and u.CreateTime <= ${EndTime}
				Order By u.CreateTime;
